name: Rusty
description: Rusty is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant red body color called 'rossoCorsa' and classic box and buttons design, Rusty stands out among its robotic peers. Its classic arms and legs give it a timeless appeal while the red and black screen adds a touch of sophistication. Rusty is not just a visually appealing robot but also possesses impressive abilities and skills to assist its club members.
